item.title: Hgame Week1 Oldfashion_orw复现
item.description: Arch: amd64-64-little RELRO: Partial RELRO Stack: No canary found NX: NX enabled PIE: No PIE (0x400000) int __cdecl main(int argc, const char **argv, const char **envp) { int result; // eax char buf[40]; // [rsp+0h] [rbp-30h] BYREF size_t nbytes; // [rsp+28h] [rbp-8h] init_io(argc, argv, envp); disable_syscall(); write(1, "size?\n", 6uLL); read(0, buf, 0x10uLL); nbytes = atoi(buf); if ( (__int64)nbytes <= 32 ) { write(1, "content?\n", 9uLL); read(0, buf, (unsigned int)nbytes); write(1, "done!
